column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.1
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Attitude__|Label|Polarity
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Graduation|Kind|Scaling
#Text=I completely agree with Herein when she writes, \u201CThe problem is bigger than Mr.
#Text=Trump\u201D.
#Text=While I find Trump to be completely abhorrent, in essence, he has only served to reflect a society that is deeply divided and very frustrated.
#Text=He has served to illuminate and give a platform to misogynistic, racist & isolationist/nationalist idealism.
#Text=It is a frightening state of affairs here in America.
#Text=That said, Hillary Clinton DID win the popular vote.
#Text=One of the biggest problems in America is the electoral college.
#Text=Now, twice in recent history, two extremely qualified candidates have lost the election b/c of the electoral college: Hillary Clinton & Al Gore.
#Text=We need to let the people\u2019s true voices be heard.
#Text=We need to amend the constitution and abolish the electoral college.
#Text=It was established by the founding fathers of America to ensure equal representation for each state, but it is now completely antiquated and detrimental to America.
#Text=In fact, I can think of a few constitutional amendments that need to be abolished \u2026starting with the 2nd amendment!!!
#Text=(But, I digress)2) I somewhat agree with Herein when she writes, \u201CShe lost because she was a woman\u201D.
#Text=While I agree that it was one of the factors, I certainly did not vote for Hillary b/c she was a woman and I hope no one else did either!

#Text=I voted for Hillary b/c I have the utmost respect for her 30 years of public service, her balanced thoughtful approach to making decisions and b/c she is the most qualified candidate to have EVER run for the highest office in America!
#Text=In fact, it frustrated me when Hillary kept referring to \u201Cthe glass ceiling\u201D.
#Text=While I understand that it is not the case right now, every women should be judged on her merit alone\u2026.not the color of her pantsuit.
#Text=I am confident that within our lifetime we will be addressing a \u201CMadam President\u201D.
#Text=Why?
#Text=...Because we are raising woman that BELIEVE they CAN be president.
#Text=For that, (among so many other reasons), I am thankful to women like Hillary Clinton.
